title: Dune: Part Two
review: Epic sci-fi masterpiece that surpasses the first film. Denis Villeneuve delivers stunning visuals, deeper character development, and one of the best sci-fi sequels ever made.

title: Oppenheimer
review: Christopher Nolan's brilliant biopic that swept the Oscars. Cillian Murphy delivers a career-defining performance. The Trinity test scene is cinema history.

title: Barbie
review: A surprisingly deep and hilarious social commentary wrapped in pink. Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling deliver perfect performances. Clever, fun, and meaningful.

title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
review: Monster mashup extravaganza with insane action sequences. Pure spectacle over substance, but delivers exactly what fans want: giant monsters fighting.

title: Kung Fu Panda 4
review: Entertaining return of Po with new characters. Not as strong as the original trilogy but delivers enough humor and heart for family audiences.

title: Deadpool & Wolverine
review: Hilarious, meta, and action-packed. Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman have incredible chemistry. The perfect MCU debut for Deadpool.

title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
review: Strong continuation of the Apes saga with breathtaking visuals and emotional depth. Proves this franchise still has plenty to say.
image: assets/movieposters2024/Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes.jpeg

title: Inside Out 2
review: Brilliant sequel that explores teenage emotions with Pixar's signature heart and humor. Anxiety character is perfectly realized.

title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
review: Epic prequel with breathtaking action and Anya Taylor-Joy's fierce performance. George Miller delivers another masterpiece.

title: The Fall Guy
review: Fun, action-packed love letter to stunt performers. Ryan Gosling and Emily Blunt have great chemistry. Surprisingly heartfelt.
